about_the_game: Halberd Black is an action-adventure JRPG set thousands of years into the future of our galaxy, where you play as a Stark, a genetically engineered human being caught in a struggle to survive and protect those he hold's most dear from those who'd wish him harm. Explore the rich story of the Halberd Black universe and explore the beautiful landscapes, dense city streets and enjoy combat reminiscent of the JRPG's of old ( With a Modern Twist ). Fight a wide variety of enemies using a dynamic turn-based combat system. Explore new environments as you seek strength to fight back against the powerful megacorporation that is after you and your friends. Only through grit and determination will you be able to fight against the threats that are coming your way. The only question is, do you have what it takes?

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains acts of violence, torture, and alcohol and drug use.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel N4100 (or similar) or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 or better
